argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nn0re | |- ( N e. NN0 -> N e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | #P_0re | |- 0 e. RR |
| 3 |  | #P_letri3 | |- ( ( N e. RR /\ 0 e. RR ) -> ( N = 0 <-> ( N <_ 0 /\ 0 <_ N ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( N e. RR -> ( N = 0 <-> ( N <_ 0 /\ 0 <_ N ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( N = 0 <-> ( N <_ 0 /\ 0 <_ N ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_nn0ge0 | |- ( N e. NN0 -> 0 <_ N ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_biantrud | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( N <_ 0 <-> ( N <_ 0 /\ 0 <_ N ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_nn0z | |- ( N e. NN0 -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 9 |  | #P_0z | |- 0 e. ZZ |
| 10 |  | #P_zleltp1 | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ 0 e. ZZ ) -> ( N <_ 0 <-> N < ( 0 + 1 ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( N <_ 0 <-> N < ( 0 + 1 ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_0p1e1 | |- ( 0 + 1 ) = 1 |
| 13 | 12 | #P_breq2i | |- ( N < ( 0 + 1 ) <-> N < 1 ) |
| 14 | 11, 13 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( N <_ 0 <-> N < 1 ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( N <_ 0 <-> N < 1 ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 7, 15 | #P_3bitr2rd | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( N < 1 <-> N = 0 ) ) |
\
 A nonnegative integer less than ` 1 ` is ` 0 ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.)  Obsolete version of ~ nn0lt10b as of 25-Mar-2020. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
